mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trace( hop, A_ip, A_country, A_province, A_city, A_operator, A_p, B_ip, B_country, B_province, B_city, B_operator, B_p) VALUES( #{hop}, #{A_ip}, #{A_country}, #{A_province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{A_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{A_operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{A_p}, #{B_ip}, #{B_country}, #{B_province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{B_city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{B_operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{B_p});
